description: Mallory submits to tight rope & bamboo bondage in this weeks update. We are trying a newer twist using stiff bamboo along with ropes to bind this beauty. At first she Mallory thought the bamboo would be "fun", that is until she learned that no matter what she tried, the bamboo would not budge... Tormented & fucked... Mallory will never doubt again
title: Smoking Hot Mallory Rae
